code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{Plus,X,Mail,User}from'lucide-react';import'./EmailConfig.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const EmailRecipientManager=_ref=>{let{recipients,onRecipientsChange}=_ref;const[newEmail,setNewEmail]=useState('');const[newName,setNewName]=useState('');const validateEmail=email=>{const re=/^[^\s@]+@[^\s@]+\.[^\s@]+$/;return re.test(email);};const addRecipient=()=>{if(!newEmail||!validateEmail(newEmail)){alert('Please enter a valid email address');return;}const newRecipient={id:"recipient_".concat(Date.now()),email:newEmail.trim(),name:newName.trim()||newEmail.trim().split('@')[0]};onRecipientsChange([...recipients,newRecipient]);setNewEmail('');setNewName('');};const removeRecipient=id=>{onRecipientsChange(recipients.filter(r=>r.id!==id));};const handleKeyPress=e=>{if(e.key==='Enter'){addRecipient();}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"email-recipient-manager",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"email-recipient-add",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"email-recipient-input-group",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Name (optional)",value:newName,onChange:e=>setNewName(e.target.value),onKeyPress:handleKeyPress,className:"email-recipient-input"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"email",placeholder:"Email address *",value:newEmail,onChange:e=>setNewEmail(e.target.value),onKeyPress:handleKeyPress,className:"email-recipient-input"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("button",{type:"button",onClick:addRecipient,className:"email-recipient-add-btn",disabled:!newEmail,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Plus,{size:14}),"Add"]})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"email-recipient-list",children:recipients.length===0?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"email-recipient-empty",children:"No recipients added. Add email addresses above."}):recipients.map(recipient=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"email-recipient-item",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"email-recipient-info",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(User,{size:14}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"email-recipient-name",children:recipient.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"email-recipient-email",children:recipient.email})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"button",onClick:()=>removeRecipient(recipient.id),className:"email-recipient-remove-btn",title:"Remove recipient",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(X,{size:14})})]},recipient.id))})]});};export default EmailRecipientManager;
